project.description: Triggered by a finished ovoc_server night build and performs: 1. create a tested VM: launch new instance from sanity AMI and get its IP address 2. run python script which ssh to the tested VM and download the latest DVD3.iso 3. tests: install, integration tests 4. python script copies all logs from tested VM to the jenkins slave 5. archive the logs 6.if build passed then terminate the tested machine

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: FullTesting
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: this param is inherited from ovoc build

condition.command: BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4.1000" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4.2000" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4.3000" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4."* ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

buildStep.command: # in branch 7.4.* we need to arrange the directory EMS/target # so it will contain only the 5 jar files we copied from build-ovoc job archive # and all executables cd EMS chmod 0775 target cp FKGenerator.ini target cd target cp common/target/common-7.4.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . cp database/target/database-7.4.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . cp EMS/target/server-7.4.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . cp oracle_triggers/target/oracle_trigger-7.4.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . cp rest-core/target/rest-core-7.4.*-SNAPSHOT.jar . rm -rf common rm -rf EMS rm -rf rest-core rm -rf oracle_triggers rm -rf database rm -rf target chmod 0775 *

condition.command: BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [[ "$BRANCH" == "master" ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
DefaultGateway="172.16.132.1" #1. create a tested VM: launch new instance from sanity AMI and get its IP address emsTestedVM="$(aws ec2 run-instances --image-id ami-ce2b84a1 --instance-market-options MarketType=spot --count 1 --instance-type c4.2xlarge --key-name "Jenkins & App subnets machines key pair" --security-group-ids sg-77bce41e --subnet-id subnet-35295a5c || aws ec2 run-instances --image-id ami-ce2b84a1 --count 1 --instance-type c4.2xlarge --key-name "Jenkins & App subnets machines key pair" --security-group-ids sg-77bce41e --subnet-id subnet-35295a5c)" #keep instance ID INSTANCE_ID="$(echo "${emsTestedVM}" |grep InstanceId |cut -d '"' -f 4)" #add tag to this instans: "emsSanity" aws ec2 create-tags --resources ${INSTANCE_ID} --tags Key=Name,Value=emsSanityInstall #set to its delete volume when instance will be terminated aws ec2 modify-instance-attribute --instance-id ${INSTANCE_ID} --block-device-mappings "{ \"DeviceName\": \"/dev/sda1\", \"Ebs\": { \"DeleteOnTermination\": true } } " #keep ip address into "vmIP" vmIP="$(echo "${emsTestedVM}" |grep PrivateIpAddress |tail -1 |cut -d '"' -f 4)"
#find what is the current branch BRANCH=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` if [ $BRANCH == master ]; then BRANCH="7.4"; fi
echo "INSTANCE_ID=${INSTANCE_ID}" > sanity.properties echo "vmIP=${vmIP}" >> sanity.properties echo "BRANCH=${BRANCH}" >> sanity.properties
#wait for the new machine to come up #tatus="notknown" #ntil [[ $status == "running" ]]; do #tatus=$(EC2 tools command to get the status) #f [[ $status != "running" ]]; then sleep 3; fi sleep 300
#2. run python scripts: set network, install cd EMS/VersionRelease python2.7 setNetwork.py $vmIP $DefaultGateway python2.7 SanityInstall.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP $ISO_DEPLOY_DESTINATION # run sanity tests and log collect if [[ "$BRANCH" == "7.4" || "$BRANCH" == "7.4.1000" || "$BRANCH" == "7.4.2000" ]] then python2.7 SanityTest.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP else python2.7 SanityTest.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP $FullTesting python2.7 SanityCopyLogs.py $NEW_TAG $vmIP fi
#3. if tests pass then terminate the tested machine aws ec2 terminate-instances --instance-ids ${INSTANCE_ID}
